rows.label: qev075501_MSG0001
rows.name:
...Hmm? Are you a BLADE? Then it is best you take
care as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0002
rows.name:
The villain that defeated Ni Gombe, the leader of
my team, is a vile and bloodthirsty beast.
He strikes at Wrothian and humans with equal glee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask for more information to help formulate a plan.

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0020
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you can handle anyone fool enough to try you.

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0003
rows.name:
You show the caution of a veteran warrior.
I shall share with you all that I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Someone has been attacking our soldiers in the plains
surrounding New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0005
rows.name:
In the course of our investigation, we came upon a
rumor that the villain responsible may be a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0006
rows.name:
If so, it is more reason we cannot ignore the matter.
That was why Ni Gombe set out to find him,
yet he was beaten before ever sighting his quarry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0007
rows.name:
You BLADEs specialize in investigations of this sort,
do you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0008
rows.name:
I would welcome your help in unmasking this demon,
and will see that you are well rewarded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0009
rows.name:
I do not doubt your skill, but even Wrothian Skells
have been taken down in the blink of an eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0010
rows.name:
...I see that information does not faze you.
I do not know if that proves strength or foolishness,
but either way you are an interesting human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Since your heart knows no fear, I would ask your aid
in uncovering the party behind these attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Amongst the few who have seen him, one reported
that the perpetrator is Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0013
rows.name:
If that is so, it is all the more reason we cannot ignore
the matter. So might you accept this task?
I will see that you are well paid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0014
rows.name:
I thank you. And one thing further...
If a Wrothian IS responsible, I may know who it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0015
rows.name:
But if I am right, I must speak with him directly and
learn why he would do this. Even if it means my death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0030
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0031
rows.name: Promise to uncover the culprit.

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask who Go Rogan thinks the culprit might be.

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I see the tales of you BLADEs are not exaggerated.
Your words ring of bravery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ni Gombe was attacked at Headwater Summit.
His assailant may still be nearby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Forgive me, but if I am mistaken, it would mean
needlessly slandering those who have done much for
my people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0019
rows.name: I do not wish to speak out of baseless conjecture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0020
rows.name:
As to the matter at hand, Ni Gombe was attacked at
Headwater Summit. His assailant may still be nearby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Whoever or whatever this villain is, it's clear that he
possesses uncommon strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Make every possible preparation before you
set out for Headwater Summit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Gi Zang has told me everything. I had my suspicions...
After all, few Wrothians possess such strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0024
rows.name:
But I am still shocked to hear it was him.
And that the attacks were all part of his training![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0025
rows.name:
It is the stuff of old talesâ€”proof that the Hundred
Hellions live on in our day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask about Go Rogan's relationship with Gi Zang.

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0060
rows.name: Note

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0061
rows.name: Mention how Go Rogan sounds happy about this.

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0026
rows.name:
When I heard a survivor of the Hundred Hellions had
come to Mira aboard our ship, I went to meet him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0027
rows.name:
When he later left the army and told His Highness he
was setting off to train, I questioned his sanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0028
rows.name:
But look at him! He has returned with the strength to
back up his title! I am sure his brothers-in-arms who
departed this life are pleased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0029
rows.name:
In the past he was but a boy, not yet fit to bear the
name of the Hundred Hellions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0030
rows.name:
But look at him now! He has returned with the strength
to back up his title![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0031
rows.name:
The Hundred Hellions are truly back from the grave.
What happier news could there be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Here, warrior. I would like you to have this as thanks
for making this reunion possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0033
rows.name:
Mmm. I gave one of your men a terrible beating out
there. Would you really forgive me so easily?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0034
rows.name:
It was all a part of your training, was it not?
Then I am sure it was also good for Ni Gombe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0035
rows.name:
Though if you are set on atoning, I would ask that you
give my men more such opportunities to train.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0036
rows.name: If that is all you want, I am happy to oblige.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Ah, to be taught the ways of war by one of the
legendary Hundred Hellions! I feel like I am dreaming![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0038
rows.name:
And you, [ST:playername ]!
It is a great, great honor to have met a Hellion.
Perhaps you can beg a lesson from him as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang for another match.

rows.label: qev075501_JNK0080
rows.name: Reject

rows.label: qev075501_SEL0081
rows.name: Explain that you've already fought Gi Zang plenty.

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0039
rows.name:
I must beg off, old friend.
There is no way I could beat you right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0040
rows.name:
I, too, have had my fill of fighting for the present.
But once I am stronger, I shall be coming for you.
I will beat you one of these days! I swear it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0041
rows.name:
What is this? You defeated Gi Zang? ...YOU?!
That cannot possibly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0042
rows.name: Sad but true. I haven't won a single round yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075501_MSG0043
rows.name:
I understand that space is a vast place of infinite
possibilities, but to think there are warriors beyond
even the Hundred Hellions... Astonishing.[ST:wait ]
